title: Read the Legislative Week in Review
body:
Feb 16, 2013 (Tennessee House Democratic Caucus on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/tnhdc Delivered by 
Newstex)

 Read the Legislative Week in Review

 Legislative Week in Review - February 11-14[1] tnhdc.com This week in the Tennessee State House the topic of 
education was at the forefront of the debate. Legislation that would limit local control of charter schools in Memphis 
and Nashville was moved out of subcommittee, and legislators were informed of the poor progress and 
questionable practices of the...

 [1]:            http://tnhdc.com/display_news.php?id=152
